summary: The diff does not implement the requested fallback image replacement. Only `project_state.json` was modified; no static asset or `VideoSection` change is shown.

missing_requirements.requirement: Replace the Home page VideoSection fallback image (served at public URL `/assets/video-fallback.jpeg`) with the newly uploaded image (`image-1.png`) so the fallback displays the new image while keeping the URL exactly `/assets/video-fallback.jpeg`.
missing_requirements.reason: No evidence in the diff summary of adding/updating `frontend/public/assets/video-fallback.jpeg` or verifying that it matches `image-1.png`, and no evidence of any change (or confirmation of no change) in `frontend/src/components/site/VideoSection.tsx`. The only modified file is `project_state.json`.

hallucinated_features.reason: The BuildRequest is strictly about swapping a static fallback image asset for `VideoSection` and explicitly avoids other changes; modifying `project_state.json` is not requested or mentioned.
